quests.name: Buying a house in Bravil
quests.description: Purchase a small house on the far side of the canal in Bravil.

quests.name: Buying a house in Bruma
quests.description: Purchase a house in eastern Bruma.

quests.name: Buying a house in Cheydinhal
quests.description: Purchase a typical house in Cheydinhal's western district.

quests.name: Buying a house in Chorrol
quests.description: Purchase a house in Chorrol's Great Oak Place.

quests.name: Buying a house in Leyawiin
quests.description: Purchase a modest house in Leyawiin's central district.

quests.name: Buying a house in Skingrad
quests.description: Purchase Rosethorn Hall, a large manor house in Skingrad.

quests.name: Helping Hands
quests.description: Hire a housekeeper for your manor in Skingrad.

quests.name: The Rosethorn Cache
quests.description: Find the hidden treasure of a thief who lived 200 years ago.

quests.name: Buy a house in the Imperial City
quests.description: Get your foot on the property ladder with a rundown shack in a poor district of the Imperial City.

quests.name: Where Spirits Have Lease
quests.description: It's your chance to buy a large manor, cheap! There's only one little snag...

quests.name: Battlehorn Castle
quests.description: Rescue Battlehorn Castle from marauders, and claim it as your own.

quests.name: Deepscorn Hollow
quests.description: Deepscorn Hollow is an asylum for the wicked, a refuge from the persecution of the virtuous.

quests.name: Dunbarrow Cove
quests.description: Uncover a famous pirate's lost ship and claim it as your own.

quests.name: Frostcrag Spire
quests.description: In the frozen mountains of Cyrodiil stands Frostcrag Spire, a tower of wonders for your magic-oriented character to call home.
